entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023
